objects.text:
• Professional-grade beauty system
• Premium anti-aging formulation

product_details.name: MM Premium Anti-Aging Skincare Duo | Luxury Beauty Essentials
product_details.description:
• Professional-grade beauty treatment system
• Sleek, modern silver packaging design
• Dual-product system for comprehensive skincare
• Premium anti-aging formulation
• Advanced moisturization technology
• Luxurious dispenser mechanism for precise application
• Travel-friendly packaging design
• High-end cosmetic grade materials
• Professional beauty salon quality
• Elegant minimalist aesthetic
• Sophisticated silver-tone finish
• Perfect for daily skincare routine

banner_details:
The banner features a sophisticated sales promotion for a skincare product, designed with a modern and luxurious aesthetic. A bold heading (`heading`) introduces the theme, followed by a refined subheading (`subheading`) that enhances the premium tone. Below it, a simple divider (`decorative`) leads to a feature list (`description`) highlighting key product advantages using bullet points in a clear, legible font. The price tag (`price`) is prominently featured, using a large font size for emphasis. A compelling call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) invites interaction. The right side displays a high-quality image of the skincare duo (`product_image`). The background incorporates a dual-tone diagonal split with smooth gradient fills and subtle decorative patterns.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Indigo (#2d2a4a)
- Royal Purple (#44387e)
- Lavender (#c2a2fa)
- Light Silver (#e0e0e0)
- Medium Gray (#c0c0c0)
- White (#ffffff)
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern color palette dominated by metallic silver (#C0C0C0), charcoal grey (#3C3C3C), and glossy black (#000000), which are blended to create a premium and sophisticated feel. Accents of white (#FFFFFF) serve as highlights, reflecting light and emphasizing the product's glossy surfaces. Water droplets add a refreshing and clean effect, suggesting hydration and elegance. The cool-toned gradients between silver and grey create depth and visual interest. This minimalist and high-contrast palette is ideal for an advertisement banner positioning the product as a luxury cosmetic or skincare item. Recommended palette: #C0C0C0, #3C3C3C, #000000, #FFFFFF.
